<!--
Provide the `regex` that match the new `syslog` format you suggest:
```
^log-example [0-9]{4}-(1[0-2]|0[1-9])-(3[01]|[0-2][0-9]) (2[0-3]|[01][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]):([0-5][0-9]) .+$

```
